name: jsonjsdb-monorepo
description: A comprehensive client-side relational database solution for static Single Page Applications (SPA). Jsonjsdb enables offline data storage and querying capabilities when running applications on the local file system without requiring server infrastructure.
author: Bassim Matar

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:builder
scripts.test: npm run test:core && npm run test:builder
scripts.lint: npm run lint:core && npm run lint:builder
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:core && npm run type-check:builder
scripts.check: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.verify: npm run check && npm run test
